name: Itsy Bitsy
description:
Itsy Bitsy

by Natalie Garner

Itsy Bitsy, the tiny garden spider, has been washed away from his web. The way back home is full of obstacles and enemies. Help him jump and climb his way back to the web, but be careful of hungry fire ants! 

Game features:

-Platform and wall jumping

-Double bouncing

-Movable objects

-Enemies that kill the player

-Tunnels, traps and tools for escaping

-Cute characters

-Animations

Use the arrow keys to move and the space bar to jump. Worms, roly-polies, yellow flowers, and certain leaves and sticks can act as tools to escape pits. Blue "water" material acts like a trampoline and allows players to double bounce. Straight, vertical structures allow for wall jumping. 

The goal is to make it to the spiderweb at the end!
